WorkforceCapacity.name: WorkforceCapacity
WorkforceCapacity.description: Represents the time series for actual or forecasted workforce allocation.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the planning.

IsOmni.description: Derived from isOmni field on Workload object. Indicates that the workload is Omni-based. If workload is null, the field value defaults to false.

PlanType.description: The type of capacity plan. Possible values are: Intraday—The plan shows intraday management. LongTerm—The plan predicts the required number of full-time employees (FTEs). ShortTerm—The plan predicts the required number of shifts.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the planning.

TimeZone.description: The time zone associated with the capacity plan. Possible values are the time zones supported by Workforce Engagement.

WorkloadId.description: The foreign key to the Workload object.
